      • getAllByPublicOrUser

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM trail t LEFT JOIN authenticated_user u ON t.creator_id = u.user_id WHERE t.trail_public OR u.user_id = :userId ORDER BY t.trail_name",
       nativeQuery=true)
